citations.narrative:
During the inspection, puppy 2444 was observed slumping against an empty bowl placed under the enclosure's drinking
spout. It appeared that it could not use the spout given the size of the puppy compared to its larger littermates. The facility
representative was asked to fill the bowl with water, after which the puppy proceeded to drink for 3 minutes. On
examination, the puppy exhibited increased skin tenting consistent with dehydration. Inability to access water can rapidly
cause dehydration in puppies. The facility must ensure continuous access to water for all dogs.
Correct by 6/27/24.
A complete routine inspection was conducted starting on 6/27/24. This inspection report is limited to the Direct non-
compliances identified during that inspection. An additional inspection report will be delivered with the other issues
identified during this inspection.
This inspection was conducted with the licensee. The exit briefing was conducted on 6/27/24 with the licensee.
